title: Chelsea Too Easy to Beat?
description:
The FC crew react to Thomas Tuchel's suggestion that Chelsea are too easy to beat after his side's 2-1 loss at Southampton. Plus, the panel debate whether Lisandro Martinez provides enough strengths to Man United's starting defense and discuss whether Roma's fine form suggests they're in the Scudetto fight this season.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Tuchel suggests Chelsea are too easy to beat after loss to Southampton; Martinez good enough to start at Man U?; Roma in title hunt
